# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files

file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/sandler2.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/sandler2.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/tags ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/tags ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
add_test(NAME SANDLER2/sandler2.cir COMMAND Xyce sandler2.cir )
set_property(TEST SANDLER2/sandler2.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;bjtlev1;diode;valgrind;inductor;bsrc")
set_tests_properties(SANDLER2/sandler2.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP sandler2.cir)
add_test(NAME SANDLER2/sandler2.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} sandler2.cir ${OutputDataDir}/SANDLER2/sandler2.cir.prn sandler2.cir.prn )
set_tests_properties(SANDLER2/sandler2.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED sandler2.cir)
